definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Edmond, you have a very beautiful lady-love.
sentences.chinese: 爱德蒙你拥有一位如花似玉的爱人。

sentences.english: The lucky winner enjoys his choice of wives and lovers.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的优胜者可以有权选择不止一位妻子和爱人。
旁边躺著的就是你的爱人。

sentences.english: Your wandering eyes pull at your lover’s heartstrings.
sentences.chinese: 你迷离的眼睛紧扣爱人的心弦。

sentences.english: I. Love sums up the whole Law.
sentences.chinese: 爱人如己是一切律法的总纲。

sentences.english: It sees the dead as lovers, too.
I too loved my closest disciple although we were not beloveds .
sentences.chinese: 我也爱著我最亲近的门徒，尽管我们不曾是爱人。

sentences.english: Ask God to give you and your spouse the wisdom and discipline to manage money well.
sentences.chinese: 求神给你和你的爱人有智慧和节制来把钱管理好。

sentences.english: I have worn round my neck the evening wreath of bakulas woven by the hand of love.
sentences.chinese: 我颈上戴过爱人手织的醉花的花圈，作为晚装。

sentences.english: Open your mouth and ask if you think something is bothering your spouse.
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得你的爱人有什么烦心事，那就开口问问他。

sentences.english: Can you separate from a lover and feel whole?
sentences.chinese: 你能从某位爱人身边退开，感受一个完整的自己吗？

sentences.english: The world puts off his masks of vastness to his lover.
sentences.chinese: 世界对着他的爱人，把它浩瀚的面具掲下了。

sentences.english: Down by the salley gardens ma love and I did meet.
sentences.chinese: 我的爱人曾和我相会在柳园中。

sentences.english: My luve is like a red, red rose.
sentences.chinese: 啊，我的爱人像一朵红红的玫瑰。

sentences.english: Then live with me and be my love.
sentences.chinese: 来与我同住吧，做我的爱人。

sentences.english: You can email or text, romantically cute love quotes to your love mate to express your love gestures.
sentences.chinese: 你可以通过邮件或短信，把浪漫情话传达给你的爱人。

definition: to moisten with spittle (idiom); sharing meager resources/mutual help in humble circumstances
emotion/sentiment/affection/feelings between two persons/CL:個|个[ge4],種|种[zhong3]
